description:
This entire "Complete introduction to ZBrush" training course is separated on Volumes and would be perfect for all people who wish to start learn 3D sculpting and who wants discover amazing world of ZBrush.

At Volume 1 students will discover how to use ZBrush, how to navigate inside this amazing software, how to work with mesh and polygons.

This course has straightforward structure and student step by step would learn how to start working inside ZBrush.
title: Complete introduction to ZBrush: Volume 1. Your first start.
